text:
The National-award winning actress Kalpana was cremated at Thripunithura near here on Tuesday.

Her nephew performed the last rites and lit the funeral pyre as hundreds of admirers and members of the film fraternity watched.

Earlier, Kerala Chief Minister Oommen Chandy, leaders of various political parties, film personalities and fans paid their last respects as her body was brought to her home from Hyderabad this afternoon.

Kalpana (51), who appeared in more than 300 films, died on Monday in Hyderabad following cardiac arrest. — PTI
title: Kalpana cremated
